Benefits.Name: MonthlyPremium
Benefits.Description: The monthly amount that you pay for your health insurance plan through eternalHealth.

Benefits.Name: Deuctible (Health Benefit)
Benefits.Description: The amount you pay for covered health care services before eternalHealth starts to pay.

Benefits.Name: Deductible (Drug Benefit)
Benefits.Description: The amount you pay for covered prescription drugs before eternalHealth starts to pay.
Benefits.Detail: Tier 1 and 2 Drugs - $0 Tier 3, 4, and 5 Drugs - $185

Benefits.Name: Primary Care
Benefits.Detail: $0 Copay

Benefits.Name: Preventative Care
Benefits.Description: The portion of your care that includes screenings, check-ups, and counseling to prevent health problems before they happen
Benefits.Detail: $0 Copay

Benefits.Name: Specialist Care
Benefits.Description: Services provided by a physician that focuses on a specific area of medicine, treating certain diseases, health problems, parts of the body, or certain age groups
Benefits.Detail: $10 Copay

Benefits.Name: Preventive Dental Services
Benefits.Description: Services provided by a physician that focuses on a specific area of medicine, treating certain diseases, health problems, parts of the body, or certain age groups
Benefits.Detail: $0 Copay

Benefits.Name: Comprehensive Dental Services
Benefits.Description: Services provided by a physician that focuses on a specific area of medicine, treating certain diseases, health problems, parts of the body, or certain age groups
Benefits.Detail: 50% Coinsurance

Benefits.Name: Routine Hearing Care
Benefits.Description: Includes but may not be limited to routine fitting exams and hearing aids
Benefits.Detail: Routine Fitting Exams - $0 Copay Per Exam.Hearing Aids - Hearing aid cost will be either $595 or $895, based upon your selection.

Benefits.Name: Routine Eye Exams
Benefits.Description: A routine eye exam is for checking your vision, screening for eye disease, and updating your prescription. Refraction is included, even when you already have a medical condition for which an annual eye exam is recommended, such as diabetes and a yearly retinopathy screening.
Benefits.Detail: $0 Copay

Benefits.Name: Eyewear Benefits
Benefits.Description: Annual upgrades to your Medicare-covered eyewear or, if you don’t yet need cataract surgery, one pair of prescription eyewear
Benefits.Detail: A maximum of $200 is covered by the plan for eyewear per year.

Benefits.Name: Telehealth Services
Benefits.Description: Certain additional telehealth services, including those for Primary Care Physician services and Physician Specialist services can be furnished through electronic exchange, so that you do not need to leave the comfort of your own home
Benefits.Detail: $0 Copay

Benefits.Name: Fitness Benefit
Benefits.Description: Members may be eligible for a maximum of $15 monthly reimbursement for any gym membership, fitness app, aquatic center, or fitness classes. Members are required to fill out a form to receive reimbursement
Benefits.Detail: $15 Per month.This amount does not roll over from month to month.

Benefits.Name: Over the Counter (OTC) Items
Benefits.Description: You can use your OTC dollars provided by eternalHealth towards CMS approved items such as pain relievers, cold medications, and first aid supplies
Benefits.Detail: $50 Every calendar quarter (every three months).This amount does not roll over from quarter to quarter.

Benefits.Name: Personal Emergency Response Device (PERS)
Benefits.Description: An electronic home unit or neck pendant available to members who meet specific criteria set by eternalHealth
Benefits.Detail: Fully covered with no cost to you.

Benefits.Name: COVID-19 Tests
Benefits.Detail: Eight COVID-19 Tests Per Calendar Month

Benefits.Name: Prescription Drugs (Retail)
Benefits.Description: Prescribed drugs that are dispensed at a network pharmacy

Benefits.Name: Prescription Drugs (Mail)
Benefits.Description: eternalHealth’s mail-order service allows you to order at least a 30-day supply of the drug and up to a 100-day supply of the drug on Tiers 1, 2, 3 or 4
